name: Yet Another Pong Clone
description:
I'm not a game developer by trade although I did start out as one almost 10 years ago. Since then, I focused more and more on marketing and producing entertainment, and less on creating it. I haven't been involved in any active development in years, so today I set myself a challenge: to create Pong in one day.

So I sat down with GameMaker: Studio and did just that. It was nice to go back to where I once started, back to creating content. I hope you guys enjoy, and maybe I'll do this again soon!
